# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please report it via [GitHub Security Advisories](https://github.com/cmyui/import-analyzer-py/security/advisories/new) instead of the public issue tracker.

We will acknowledge receipt within 48 hours and provide a detailed response within 7 days.

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| Latest  | :white_check_mark: |
